Element definition: Unique international identifier of the monitoring site in which the data were obtained.
Specification of whether the monitoring site is a WFD monitoring site ('euMonitoringSiteCode') or not ('eionetMonitoringSiteCode').
Value definitions:
eionetMonitoringSiteCode: EIONET identifier;
euMonitoringSiteCode: WFD identifier

Element definition: Water body category code, as defined in the codelist.
Unique code of the determinand monitored, as defined in the codelist.
Specification of which fraction of the sample was analysed.
Type of media monitored.
Unit of measure for the reported values.
Year during which the data were sampled.
The period of the year during which the data used for the aggregation were sampled.
The smallest concentration that can be distinguished from the analytical blank at a chosen level of statistical confidence (usually 95%).
Number of sample values included in the aggregated data.
Number of sample values below LOQ included in the aggregated data.
Flag to indicate whether the minimum sample value used for the aggregation was below the analytical limit of quantification (LOQ).
Minimum sample value of the data used for aggregation.
Flag to indicate whether the mean value is below the highest LOQ.
Mean value of the data used for aggregation.
Flag to indicate whether the maximum sample value used for the aggregation was below the analytical limit of quantification (LOQ).
Maximum sample value of the data used for aggregation.
Flag to indicate whether the median value is below the highest LOQ.
Median value of the data used for aggregation.
Standard deviation value of the data used for aggregation.
CEN/ISO code of the analytical method.
Depth at which sample was taken in meter below water surface.
Status of the observed value in terms of its availability, relevancy, correctness or specifics of its source category.
Remarks, comments or explanatory notes.
Unique metadata identifier of version of the feature or record. Url that points either to the source of the reported data or to a page providing information on the data origin.
Timestamp when feature or record was created. In case of reported data it's the release date and time of the respective CDR envelope.
Status of the feature or record regarding its registration.
Status of the record regarding its reliability.
Aditional information or statements regarding the reliability of the feature or record.
Unique identifier of the record in the EEA WISE_SOE database.
